doc.title: The Prata Place: The Ultimate Murthabak!
doc.text: The/DT upcoming/NNP Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP has/VBZ given/VBN many/JJ hawkers/NNS the/DT opportunity/NN to/TO dream/VB ./. I/PRP met/VBD up/RP with/IN Gunalan/NN this/DT week/NN to/TO see/VB his/PRP$ vision/NN of/IN the/DT Ultimate/NNP Murthabak/NNP and/CC I/PRP am/VBP very/RB excited/JJ with/IN what/WP he/PRP came/VBD up/RP with/IN ./. Not/RB good/JJ ,/, VERY/JJ GOOD/NN !/. The/DT Red/NN Bean/NN Prata/NN is/VBZ reminicent/JJ of/IN the/DT chinese/NN version/NN except/NN that/IN the/DT dough/NN here/RB is/VBZ super/RB thin/JJ and/CC crispy/JJ ./.
